titleStmt.title: The downfall of pride. Riband-cod-pieces, black-patches, and whatsoever is antick, apish, fantastic, and dishonourable to a civil government. To the tune of, Bragandry.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, Humphrey, fl. 1635-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Grove on Snow-hill,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
